Flying

text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

{1}{B}: Regenerate Augur of Skulls.

editions.flavor: Within each empty skull, it seeks ways to preserve its own failing undeath.

text:
Flying

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
